dict.acceptation: 天资，才能；天才，人才；塔兰特，古代的一种计量单位，可用来记重量或作为货币单位；<旧，非正式>性感的人；

sent.orig: Now benefits correctly from the Find Weakness talent.Cooldown reduced to 10 sec.
sent.trans: 现在正确的利益从查找薄弱talent.Cooldown减少到10秒。

sent.orig: Global talent directors were appointed, talent programmes developed, talent consultants abounded-an entire industry created.
sent.trans: 全球人才主管获得任命，人才计划被制定出来，人才咨询顾问大量涌现，一个完整的行业由此形成。

sent.orig: Talent Agencies include the talent agencies approved by the Ministry of Personnel and Beijing Personnel Bureau.
sent.trans: 人才中介服务机构包括人事部和北京市人事局批准的人才中介服务机构。

sent.orig: Improved Drain Mana-Damage caused by this talent is now improved by the Shadow Mastery talent.
sent.trans: 暗影掌握天赋现在对魔法吸取起增强作用。

sent.orig: The market was forming, and talent and the cultivation of talent required time.
sent.trans: 一方面市场形成了，而另一方面人才和心智的培植还需要时间。
